ygData.subject: To the Extreme

Date: Fri, 24 Nov 2000 12:44:47 EST
Subject: To the Extreme
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...



    The eight foot Maximal ran as fast as his mechanical legs would allow 
him, the robot letting out a cry as he tripped on a pipe, slamming to his 
chest.  He pushed himself up, running through the dark alley in the province 
of Polyhex on Cybertron.  He looked back, stumbling and hitting the ground.
    "NO!" he yelled as two Cybertronians that were more than ten feet high 
approached him.  The Maximal got up, but was punched by one of the attackers, 
slamming to the ground.  

    "Perc, you have lost faith in our cause.  You have not chosen the organic 
path.  You have ignored the will of the Oracle and great Matrix.  For this, 
you shall receive punishment." a eight-and-a-half foot tall black robot said 
as he came from the shadows, holding a large rectangular device.  

    "Feral, I didn't do it!  I swear by the Matrix itself!  I didn't tell 
anyone!"
    "You now lie to your own leader, and try to snivel out of what is really 
a gift, and not a punishment?"
    "If you like it so much, you use that goop on yourself!" Perc yelled, the 
weak looking bot said, getting to his feet slowly.
    "I have to much work to do to take the enlightened path.  You on the 
other hand, alerted the Tripredacus Council and Maximal Elders of our 
warehouse in southern Polyhex.  We lost over thirty members and great 
resources, just so you could be pardoned." Feral raised the rectangular 
device, the side pointing towards Perc sliding open.  "Hold him."
    Perc let out a scream as the two large bots charged him, slamming him 
into a wall.  Each took out a a long pole with pinchers on the end from their 
personal subspace pockets, clamping the pinchers onto Perc's wrists, pulling 
his arms spread out.
    "Prepare for your punsihment." Feral said as he stepped closer to Perc, 
reaching into the box and taking out a circular plant-like organism.  He 
tossed the metal box to the ground without a care.  
    "NO!  NOT THE SPORES!"
    "Yes, the spores." Feral said with a smiled, grabbing the back of Perc's 
head, raising the spore pod five inches from Perc's head, slowly pushing his 
head towards the pod.
    "NO!  I'M A FERINE!  NOT THE SPORES!  ANYTHING BUT THE SPORES!"
    Feral gave an evil smile as Perc's face reached less than an inch from 
the spore pod, the top of the pod bursting open as thousands of yellowish 
spores shot out into Perc's face.  Feral stepped back, the dark robot 
laughing as his two soldiers let loose their grip with the pinchers, stepping 
to the side as Perc fell to his knees.
    The Maximal clawed at his face as his once bright blue body began to dim 
into a tawny yellow, his once bright red optics dimming into a dark yellow, 
the Maximal collapsing.
    "Excellent.  Alert the nearest group of authorities.  Let them take in 
this trash, and when the spores take full effect, they shall see what it is 
like to mess with the Ferine." Feral laughed, the Maximal walking away with 
his two soldiers, leaving Perc twitching on the ground.
    Perc let out a scream, bright yellow scales forming on his body, claws 
shooting out of his finger and toe tips.  He screamed once more as fangs 
extended from his mouth, and saliva began pouring out of his mouth.
